Egor Lynov Website

Hi, my name is Egor and this is basic information about me

My birthday is May 31, 1987, and I was born in Voronezh. Koltsov's Gymnasium was where I studied. I got carried away with Olympiad programming at school. As a specialty system programmer, I graduated from Voronezh State University's Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Mechanics. I've worked as a software engineer since 2009.

From 2009 to 2012, I developed software in C++. From 2012 to 2018, I have been developing web applications using Python (Django) and TypeScript (Angular). From 2018 to 2021, I'm developing infrastructure in Go using k8s, PostgreSQL and cloud technologies. Since 2021, I am developing a database in Rust for machine learning.
